hero.name: Ms. Marvel
hero.specialAbility: STRETCHYAt the start of your turn, you may move Ms. Marvel 1 space.Ms. Marvel can attack from up to 2 spaces away (ignoring zones).

cards.title: Big Wind Up
cards.duringText: If Ms. Marvel's space shares no zones with the opposing fighter, you may BOOST this card.

cards.title: Easy Peasy
cards.basicText: After combat: Draw 1 card. Then, if you have 4 or more cards in your hand, deal 1 damage to an adjacent fighter.

cards.title: Embiggen
cards.duringText: If Ms. Marvel is in more zones than the opposing fighter, the value of this card is 6 instead.

cards.title: Friends and Family
cards.basicText: Draw 2 cards. Then, you may spend an additional action to draw until you have 7 cards in your hand.

cards.title: Gyro and Fries
cards.basicText: Recover 2 health. Then, if you have 4 or more cards in your hand, gain 1 action.

cards.title: I'm Not Touching You
cards.basicText: After combat: If Ms. Marvel's space shares no zones with the opposing fighter, draw 2 cards.

cards.title: Shrink! Shrink! Shrink!
cards.basicText: After combat: Choose one effect. If Ms. Marvel's space shares no zones with the opposing fighter, do both:%Your opponent discards 1 card%Move the opponent up to 3 spaces.

cards.title: Slingshot
cards.basicText: After combat: Place Ms. Marvel in any space in her zone.

cards.title: Fangirl
cards.duringText: The value of this card is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

cards.title: Feint
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.title: Momentous Shift
cards.duringText: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.
